message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to show you this amazing product. I think you'll love it. I'm willing to offer it to you for $12000. What do you think?
I'm very interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9000. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?
I understand you're interested in the product, but I'm not sure I can go as low as $9000. I'm willing to meet you in the middle at $10500. What do you think?
I'm still very interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $8500. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?
I'm starting to think we're getting close to a deal, but I still need to make a profit. I'm willing to go down to $9500, but that's as low as I can go. What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but I was thinking more along the lines of $8200. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?
I'm starting to feel like we're getting close to the bottom line. I'm willing to meet you at $9000, but I'm not going any lower than that. This is my final offer on that price
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but I was thinking more along the lines of $8500. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?

I'm not willing to go any lower than $9000, and I've already told you that. I'm starting to think we're just going in circles. I'm willing to compromise at $9200, but that's as low as I can go. This is my last offer
